verses.roman:
nityaṁ sannihitas tatra
bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
smṛtyāśeṣāśubha-haraṁ
sarva-maṅgala-maṅgalam

synonyms: nityam—eternally; sannihitaḥ—present; tatra—there; bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; madhusūdanaḥ—Madhusūdana; smṛtyā—by remembrance; aśeṣa-aśubha—of everything inauspicious; haram—which takes away; sarva-maṅgala—of all auspicious things; maṅgalam—the most auspicious.
translation: Lord Madhusūdana, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, is eternally present in Dvārakā. It is the most auspicious of all auspicious places, and merely remembering it destroys all contamination.
